item.title: Vision-R1: Evolving Human-Free Alignment in Large Vision-Language Models via Vision-Guided Reinforcement Learning
item.description: Vision-R1: Improves LVLMs via vision-guided reinforcement learning, eliminating the need for human feedback and specialized reward models.
